CustomField.description: This roll up summary field is used to collect the data from the picklist field Renewal_Data_Error_Type__c from SBQQ__QuoteLine__c and validate the renewal calculations
CustomField.label: Renewal Data Validation

summaryFilterItems.value: Uplift is Null, Quote Uplift Did Not Match with Contract Uplift, Customer Price Didnt Match, Amount is Null, Shipping Address On Quote Is Null, Ship To On QuoteLine Is Null, Quantity Is Zero or negative
